text:
e="preserve">Image:Jamie-Lynn Sigler NYC.jpg|thumb|Sigler in 2007
Jamie-Lynn Sigler (born May 15, 1981) is an American actress and singer born in Jericho, New York.
Career.
She is best known for playing Meadow Soprano in "The Sopranos". She also played call girl Heidi Fleiss in an American television movie. She was born in Jericho, New York.
Personal life.
In January 2016, Sigler revealed that she was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis when she was 20 years old.
